3 Nice of you to remember ! But I will take something else . I want an espresso macchiato .	Which size ?
4 Small cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 No , that is it .	So that would be a small espresso macchiato . Is that right ?
6 Let's change espresso macchiato to an iced hot chocolate instead .	Sure ! So that would be a small iced hot chocolate . Is that right ?
7 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Kerry .
8 Have a great day !	Have a nice day !

3 I think I will change it this time ! Can I get an espresso macchiato ?	Which size ?
4 Large .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 A double chocolate muffin , please .	So that would be a large espresso macchiato and a double chocolate muffin . Is that right ?
6 Can I get a latte , please ?	Sure ! So that would be a large latte and a double chocolate muffin . Is that right ?
7 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Charlie .
8 Enjoy your day !	Have a nice day !

3 Nice of you to remember ! But I will take something else . A green tea .	Which size ?
4 Medium , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 That is it .	So that would be a medium green tea . Is that right ?
6 I think I will switch medium with small .	Sure ! So that would be a small green tea . Is that right ?
7 Actually , I would like large instead .	Sure ! So that would be a large green tea . Is that right ?
8 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , John .
9 Have a nice day !	Have a nice day !

5 Ah yes , an everything bagel , please .	So that would be a medium cordusio and an everything bagel . Is that right ?
6 I want small .	Sure ! So that would be a small cordusio and an everything bagel . Is that right ?
7 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Robin .
8 Alright .	Have a nice day !

3 Let's try something different . Can I have a salted caramel hot chocolate ?	Which size ?
4 Medium cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 That would be it .	So that would be a medium salted caramel hot chocolate . Is that right ?
6 May I get small ?	Sure ! So that would be a small salted caramel hot chocolate . Is that right ?
7 Can I have large instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a large salted caramel hot chocolate . Is that right ?
8 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Mindy .
9 Have a great day !	Have a nice day !

7 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , David .
8 Alright .	Have a nice day !

3 Maybe not this time ! Can I have a breakfast tea , please ?	Which size ?
4 Large .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 Could I get an everything bagel , please ?	So that would be a large breakfast tea and an everything bagel . Is that right ?
6 Sorry , I would like to change that to small .	Sure ! So that would be a small breakfast tea and an everything bagel . Is that right ?
7 Yeap .	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Charlize .
8 Cheers !	Have a nice day !

4 Medium , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 That would be it .	So that would be a medium green tea . Is that right ?
6 Indeed !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Mindy .
7 Cheers !	Have a nice day !

3 No , not today . Could I get a cordusio , please ?	Which size ?
4 Small would do .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 I am good .	So that would be a small cordusio . Is that right ?
6 Yes !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Kevin .
7 Goodbye !	Have a nice day !

1 True , 13 , Ashley Benson , small , espresso macchiato
2 Hey there !	Hello , Ashley Benson ! Would you like to have a small espresso macchiato again ?
3 No , I think I will try something else instead . I would like an espresso , please .	Which size ?
4 Large cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 Hmm , a chocolate caramel shortbread , please .	So that would be a large espresso and a chocolate caramel shortbread . Is that right ?
6 Hmm , can I change to medium instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a medium espresso and a chocolate caramel shortbread . Is that right ?
7 Sorry , I would like to change that to a cappuccino .	Sure ! So that would be a medium cappuccino and a chocolate caramel shortbread . Is that right ?
8 Sounds good !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Ashley .
9 Have a nice day !	Have a nice day !

1 True , 68 , Jensen Ackles , large , noisette , lemon pound cake
2 Hello !	Hello , Jensen Ackles ! Would you like to have a large noisette and a lemon pound cake again ?
3 No , not today . May I get a white hot chocolate ?	Which size ?
4 Small , please .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 Could I get a chocolate chip cookie ?	So that would be a small white hot chocolate and a chocolate chip cookie . Is that right ?
6 On second thought , I would have a caramel macchiato instead .	Sure ! So that would be a small caramel macchiato and a chocolate chip cookie . Is that right ?
7 Let's change caramel macchiato to a black tea instead .	Sure ! So that would be a small black tea and a chocolate chip cookie . Is that right ?
8 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Jensen .
9 Thanks !	Have a nice day !

3 Maybe not this time ! Can I have a cappuccino ?	Which size ?
4 Medium cup .	Would you like anything else with that ?
5 I would like a blueberry muffin , please .	So that would be a medium cappuccino and a blueberry muffin . Is that right ?
6 Hmm , can I change to a breakfast tea instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a medium breakfast tea and a blueberry muffin . Is that right ?
7 Erm , I would like a lemon pound cake actually .	Sure ! So that would be a medium breakfast tea and a lemon pound cake . Is that right ?
8 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , RuPaul .
9 Thank you !	Have a nice day !

7 Hmm , can I change to an espresso con panna instead ?	Sure ! So that would be a large espresso con panna . Is that right ?
8 That sounds right !	Your order will be ready at the next counter , Matt .
9 Goodbye !	Have a nice day !
